壐字的基本解释

壐
xǐ
古同“玺”，印。

壐字的汉语字典释义

[①]［xǐ］
［《廣韻》斯氏切，上紙，心。］
亦作“壐1”。亦作“鉨1”。“玺1”的繁体字。
(1)印信。秦以前以金玉银铜制成，尊卑通用。秦以来专指皇帝的印，以玉制。
(2)姓。明代有璽书。见《续通志·氏族补遗》。

壐字的康熙字典解释

【丑集中】【土字部】　壐； 康熙笔画：17； 页码：页241第05
【說文】同璽。壐所以主土，故从土。【小篆】从玉。詳玉部璽字註。　又人名。稷之弟曰台壐，台壐生叔均，見【山海經】。又【路史·同姓名辨】覩叔均而思稷子，則叔均爲稷之子。今云稷弟，疑有誤。

壐字的源字形

字源演变：

小篆楷体

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体日本明朝体韩国明朝体旧字形
壐字的起名意思

暂无。

壐
Basic explanation of words
壐
xǐ
Ancient with the "Xin", printed.
壐
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［xǐ］
["Guangyun" Si Shi cut, put on paper, heart. ]
Also known as "壐1". Also known as "鉨1". Traditional characters for "玺1".
(1) Seal. Before the Qin Dynasty, it was made of gold, jade, silver and copper, and it was universally respectable. Since the Qin Dynasty, it specifically refers to the emperor's seal, made of jade.
(2) Last name. There is a seal book in the Ming Dynasty. See "Continued History · Clan Addendum".
壐
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Ugly Collection] [Tu Zi Department] 　壐; Kangxi Strokes: 17; Page Number: Page 241 05
[Said the text] Tongxi. So it is the main soil, so it is from the soil. 【Xiaozhu】Congyu. Detailed Yubu Xizi Note.　Another name. Ji's younger brother said Tai Yu, Tai Yu Sheng Shujun, see [Shan Hai Jing]. Also [Road History·Distinguishment of the Same Name] Uncles are all the sons of Ji. Brother Yunji today is suspected to be wrong.
